desc: I am helping a colleague improve the SEO of his UK Car lease website.We require three things:1, Cost/value analysis of most competitive ad keywordsE.g. "Car lease" or "BMW Car Lease"  may be expensive. There may be better value such as "3 month Car leasing" etc..2. Recommended site changesKeyword optimisation for our site (this may involve code and or/content recommendations, URL tweaks, and creation of specific landing pages that address user search needs identified in 1) above.3. Back linksRecommended content strategy for creating White SEO backlinks to our site over time. This may include identifying topics such as: fuel efficient cars, electric cars, safest cars, impact of personal or business leases, personal finance. My client will then create articles (and emails) writing about these topics and how they impact car leasing. The articles will be syndicated across various car lease and motoring blogs, that will carry his name, company name and link back to his site, so help build SEOI welcome quotes for the work above and an estimated time span in which to implement the work. For example £150 a week for a 12 week campaign, implementing the 3 strategies above.

desc: This project is a research project to identify 15 - 20 individuals in the state of Florida (USA) who are looking to start a business and work toward financial independence. This business opportunity will allow this person to work from home. In general, it involves helping to find qualified people who want to work from home as professional account specialists to advertise and educate consumers.A team leader will be assigned to new business owners based on their monthly financial targets:a) Team A - $500 to $1,000/mo (requires 5-10 hrs weekly)b) Team B - $1,000 to $5,000/mo (requires 10-20 hrs weekly)c) Team C - Over $5,000/mo (requires 20-30 hrs weekly)With this business opportunity there is:1) Minimum investment (under $20)2) No selling, no inventory to carry, no product delivering3) No collecting money, no handling ordersThe company handles:1) All orders, inventory, and product delivery2) Billing and collection3) Customer care with a 100% money back guarantee on all products4) First class corporate websiteWith this business opportunity all new partners will receive:1) Free training, mentoring, coaching2) Marketing tools to promote their business in person and online3) Corporate support4) The most generous compensation plan in the industry... and much moreOur team is made up of business professionals, entrepreneurs, parents, single moms and dads sharing a common interest to build our own businesses and generate a substantial income to supplement our current earnings and eventually replace our jobs and achieve total financial stability for our families.Based on how the first project goes I will be looking to repeat this process. I am only looking for serious individuals looking to start a business.
title: Business Opportunity Seekers
